title: Single dad Jason Manford overwhelmed by daughter's fancy dress choice - as he admits he "f**ked things up"
text:
Single dad Jason Manford reveals pride at being daughter's hero after candidly admitting fear of "f**king up" The comedian treated fans to a heartfelt post about fatherhood Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Jason Manford has candidly admitted his fears about “f**king things up” and being a single dad - so his daughter’s declaration that he’s her hero means the world to him. 
The comedian shared an intimate message with Facebook fans on Friday, after one of his daughters chose to dress like him for Super Hero Day at school. 
The 35-year-old shared a picture of the special moment to Facebook, showing his daughter - with her face blurred out - dressed just like dad in black trousers and a brightly patterned shirt, while clutching a microphone. It's a mini Jason! (Photo: Facebook) Jason is a super proud dad (Photo: Rex) 
Delighted Jason said: “Okay, so I know this is a brag and well, I never do this, but whatever! But today was Super Hero Day at my children's school where all the kids had to go as a hero character or their hero. 
“Although one of my daughters went as “Fantastic Cat Girl", my other daughter went as me, her dad! 
“I know it's cheesy, but after becoming a single dad and all the other times I f**ked things up or thought I wasn't being the best man that I could be; this is the kind of thing that means the world to me! 
“I just have to make sure that I keep being the person she thinks I am!” Read More Jason's daughter chose him as her hero (Photo: Dave J Hogan) Jason pictured in 2012 
Jason was accused of swapping flirty messages with another woman on Twitter while married to wife Catherine. They stayed together following the claims but later split. 
In a statement at the time, he said: "I can see now that what started out as a bit of messing about and having a laugh on Twitter has been misjudged. 
"I'd like to apologise to anyone that this has offended as that was the last thing I ever intended to do." 
He later split from Catherine in 2013.
